mapper.select: select NOTICE_NO, TITLE,CONTENTS,REGDATE from aws.NOTICE where NOTICE_NO>0 order by NOTICE_NO desc limit #{page},10
select NOTICE_NO, TITLE,CONTENTS,REGDATE from aws.NOTICE where NOTICE_NO>0 order by NOTICE_NO desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select count(NOTICE_NO) from aws.NOTICE where NOTICE_NO>0
mapper.insert: insert into aws.NOTICE (NOTICE_NO,TITLE, CONTENTS, REGDATE) values((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(NI.NOTICE_NO),10000000)+1 FROM aws.NOTICE NI),#{title},#{contents},NOW())
